title: New Disney's "A Christmas Carol" - What font is it?
content:
Hello to all,

Does anybody know what font is used for this poster of the new "A Christmas Carol"...  
for some reason I can't find it.

[http://www.canmag.com/images/front/movies2009/carolposter1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141127215513/http:/www.canmag.com/images/front/movies2009/carolposter1.jpg "http://www.canmag.com/images/front/movies2009/carolposter1.jpg")

Thanks loads for your help.

Pj
author: pigeoninpjs

comments.content:
Top: Trajan

Title: Graphic, not a font

Bottom: might be Baskerville

Bottom looks like Goudy to me.

- Lex

Thank you loads.  
Sorry I didn't specify, I did mean the font for the main title...  
Thank you anyways.  
iara

You can try starting with Gargoyle:  
 [http://www.identifont.com/identify?9+ACHRISTMASCAROL+J7T+5QH+4B+G39+9J+1...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141127215513/http:/www.identifont.com/identify?9+ACHRISTMASCAROL+J7T+5QH+4B+G39+9J+19+7VU+A0+U+M "http://www.identifont.com/identify?9+ACHRISTMASCAROL+J7T+5QH+4B+G39+9J+19+7VU+A0+U+M")
